channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Goolytics – Simple Google Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Goolytics – Simple Google Analytics

item.title: CVE-2022-3132|2024-08-03T01:00:10.506Z -- unknown -- goolytics%20%E2%80%93%20simple%20google%20analytics
item.description: The Goolytics WordPress plugin before 1.1.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
